Translations.Text: ane marum sanmana pachalana lokomam baki rakha
mane ne'amatovali jannatana varasadaro manthi banava
ane mara pitane mapha kari de, kharekhara te pathabhrasta loko manthi hatam
Ane te divase, jyare loko phari vara jivita karavamam avase, mane apamanita na kara
je divase dhana ane santana kami kama nahim ave
parantu phayadavalo te ja hase, je allaha ta'alani same salamativalum dila la'ine avase
ane daravavala'o mate jannata atyanta najika kari devamam avase
ane pathabhrasta loko mate jahannama jahera kari devamam avase
ane temane savala karavamam avase ke jemani tame bandagi karata rahya te loko kyam che
je allaha sivaya bija loko hatam, sum te'o tamari madada kare che? Athava ko'i badalo la'i sake che
basa! Te sau ane badha pathabhrasta loko jahannamamam undha nakhavamam avase
ane iblisana laskaro pana tyam
andaro'andara jhaghado karata kahese
ke allahana namana soganda! Kharekhara ame to spasta rite pathabhrasta hatam
jyare tamane allaha-samagrasrstina palanaharana bhagidara samaji betha hatam
ane amane to, te vidrohi sivaya bija ko'i'e pana pathabhrasta nahatam karya
have to amara mate ko'i bhalamana karanara pana nathi
ane na to subhecchuka mitra
jo kadaca eka vara phari amane javanum malatum to, ame saca imanavala bani jatam
a drsya kharekhara eka jabaradasta nisani che. Temana manthi vadhare loko imana lavavavala nathi
ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara ja vijayi, dayalu che
nuhani komana loko'e pana payagambarone juthalavya
jyare ke temana bha'i nuha a.Sa.E kahyum, ke sum tamane allahano bhaya nathi
sambhalo! Hum tamari tarapha allahano nisthavana payagambara chum
basa! Tamare allahano dara rakhavo jo'i'e ane mari vata manavi jo'i'e
Hum tamari pase tena mate ko'i valatara nathi icchato, maro badalo to phakta srstina palanahara (allaha) pase ja che
basa! Tame allahano dara rakho ane marum ajnapalana karo
kaume javaba apyo, ke sum ame tara para imana lavi'e tarum ajnapalana to nabala loko'e karyum che
